front.title: Mathematical Mesh 3.0 Part XIII: Mesh Ceremonies

abstract.t: Ceremonies are security protocols that involve human participants as principal actors. Ceremonies for onboarding devices, establishing trust between parties and obtaining multi-factor authenticated responses from users are presented and analyzed with particular application to the Mathematical Mesh. https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/mathmesh/ (http://whatever)Discussion of this draft should take place on the MathMesh mailing list (mathmesh@ietf.org), which is archived at .
